data.name: RPG Maker MV - Dignified Fantasy Music Vol. 1
data.detailed_description:
Looking for a way to add a little more sophistication and class to your fantasy projects? Look no further than Dignified Fantasy: Vol. 1!

Created by Bittersweet Entertainment, this audio pack includes a variety of orchestral themes that feature complex melodies and sounds. Take a sojourn into the world of fantasy and enjoy visiting cities filled with elves and fairies. Or jump into battle with force and fanfare. Digified Fantasy: Vol 1 is a must-have for all fans of high fantasy settings.

Features:
  • 18 BGM themes.
  • 8 ME sounds.
  • Music suitable for a variety of fantasy settings.
  • .M4a and .OGG formats included.
  • Formatted for and tested in RPG Maker MV.

data.short_description: Looking for a way to add a little more sophistication and class to your fantasy projects? Look no further than Dignified Fantasy: Vol. 1!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
